snippet: The Spanish veteran Samuel Sánchez won the seventh stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné on Saturday over a mountainous course in France.
abstract: Spanish cyclist Samuel Sanchez wins seventh stage of Criterium du Dauphine bike race over mountainous course in France, but Britain's Chris Froome retains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish veteran Samuel Sánchez won the seventh stage of the Critérium du Dauphiné on Saturday over a mountainous course in France.

headline.seo: Samuel Sánchez Wins Seventh Stage of Critérium du Dauphiné
headline.main: Spaniard Wins Stage, but Briton Is Still First
headline.print_headline: Spaniard Wins Stage, but Briton Is Still First
